EmailTemplate.name: ACV Application Status - Pending Credit Consent
EmailTemplate.subject: ACV Capital Application Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
ACV Capital Application Update
Pending Information Disclosure Authorization
You are receiving this email because we are still awaiting the Information Disclosure Authorization, which includes consent to personal credit information from the other owners. This is required in order to proceed in the review of the application. Please help us move the process along by informing them of this request. Many thanks.
